project.name: jdll2006-france
project.description: This subproject is a place to hold informations on organizing the Gentoo booth at the Journées du Logiciel Libre 2006.
project.longdescription:
The 8th Journées du Logiciel Libre (Free Software Days) will be held on October 13th-14th 2006 in Lyon, in the CPE school on the Doua/Lyon 1 Campus.
official website : http://www.jdll.org
We need more people!

ul.li: get CDs to sell on the booth
decide which animations we'll provide on the booth
list practical actions to do, deadlines, and so on

body.p:
This is the list of people related to this event:
